Title: InMotion - Venus2
Description: This Project will target the SMC pollux with its text based interpreter language venus2.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This Project will target the SMC pollux with its text based interpreter language venus2.

There will be a whole set of Functions in the framework to get and set the devices over the rs232 port.
Further documentation about venus2 and pollux http://www.micos.ws/Con_5018.html

Planned:
  1. Venus2 compatibel function set
  2. .NET for InMotion framework (C#)
  3. HPGL file-format for navigating the axis
  4. GUI / Component for visualizing and controlling the axis movement
  5. dynamic-language support (IronPython) for fast prototyping
